name: First Try
description:
Juggle gems, time, and lasers to make it to the end of the hardest game you can beat "first try"  

if you are confused watch this video of the first 4 levels:

You are stuck in a loop until you get the it perfect.

This game is hard but remember you only lose 15 secs max.

my record is 100 sec

known bugs:

>>>>don't press R while resetting, it breaks things<<<<

if the gem gets in a weird place after a restart then you have to restart the game, sorry

if you can't get the gem into the thing on the menu just restart, it's a soft lock.

collision sometimes is weird but it's edge cases.

I also had a cool reverse music thing when you reset but you can't play sounds backwards in unity webgl, awsome. So that's what the download is for, I think it really adds to the game but... you have to download it.
